      • GameMap

        public GameMap(Image background,
       int width,
       int height,
       Location destination)
        Parameters:
        background - a background image
        width - the width of the map, in pixels
        height - the height of the map, in pixels
        destination - the destination point of all units

        Parameters:

      • getTile

        public Tile getTile(Point point)
        Given a point on the map, returns the Tile enclosing that point.
        Parameters:
        point - a point (x, y) on the game map, where x and y are measured in pixels.
        Returns:
        a Tile object containing this point (x, y)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a Tile object containing this point (x, y)

      • getTargetsWithinRadius

        public List<GameElement> getTargetsWithinRadius(Location source,
                                       double radius,
                                       int howMany)
        Gets howMany number of the closest targets within a radius of a circle centered at source.
        Parameters:
        source - the center of the circle
        radius - the radius of the circle
        howMany - the number of units closest to source, within radius
        Returns:
        howMany number of elements within radius sorted by distance from source

      • getTargetsWithinRadius

        public List<GameElement> getTargetsWithinRadius(Location source,
                                       double radius)
        Gets the targets within a radius of a circle centered at source.
        Parameters:
        source - the center of the circle
        radius - the radius of the circle
        Returns:
        all elements within radius sorted by distance from source

      • getShortestPath

        public Path getShortestPath(Location start,
                   Location finish)
        Returns a Path object representing the shortest path between two locations.
        Parameters:
        start - the start location
        finish - the end location
        Returns:
        the shortest path between these two locations

      • updatePaths

        public void updatePaths()
        When the grid is modified, every element that follows a path must recalculate it's path.
